name: two way street
description:
or;  a game about being lonely, and wanting to be alone.

``

two way street is a maze narrative game made for college. the objective was to create a "self-portrait" artwork. 

navigate through mazes in pursuit of your friends, who conveniently disappear when you come into the room. how would the feeling of being unwanted affect you? how can you grow from it?

play time is ~5 minutes. the game can be played on browser for both pc and smartphone! it can also be played on a gameboy or gameboy emulator if you download the files below.

the game is free, but you can donate upon download to support me!

``

controls:
arrow keys - movement
z - confirm selections
